text: Heliconia virginalis is a species of plant in the family Heliconiaceae.José E. Abalo & Gustavo Morales L. 1983. Phytologia 52(6): 410-411, f. sn., Heliconia virginalis It is endemic to Ecuador.http Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Heliconia virginalis ==References== virginalis Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
